title: The Yacht Week Caribbean Brunch
desc: The Yacht Week Brunch series is back in full swing, and this time we're headed to the Caribbean... Because what better way to celebrate in December then with barrels of rum and treasure-filled debauchery. We are taking over Number 8 in Meatpacking, for a brunch party where the rum flows like water and the party never stops. Get your tickets now as space is limited, and until then... work like a captain and get ready to party like a pirate.
